arts.ttl: VAR to the rescue to give Mallorca a late late win
arts.sum: Mallorca’s Kosovan striker, Vedat Muriqi, took centre stage on Saturday afternoon against Espanyol, scoring an own goal, missing a penalty and then scoring the winning spot kick in the 97th minute. Make no mistake, Mallorca were rubbish for long periods but VAR and referee Quintero Gonzalez’s generosity made sure Mallorca reached their goal of 40 points, which virtually seals their survival for next season.

arts.ttl: Mallorca star equals Sergio Ramos benchmark with remarkable outing vs Espanyol
arts.sum: RCD Mallorca star Vedat Muriqi on Saturday evening secured for himself a piece of modern Spanish football history. This came owing to his exploits in Mallorca’s meeting with Espanyol. The…
Deya (6C) 12C, moderate northwest breeze easing to gentle west; humidity 45%. Binissalem (5C) 14C, moderate northwest breeze easing to light southwest; humidity 50%.

arts.ttl: Fuming over new non-smoking zones in Mallorca
arts.sum: The council confirmed to the Bulletin sister paper Mallorca Magazin that smoking is not allowed on or around the green-painted sections of the wall. The beaches of Muro near Alcudia in north east Mallorca and Port de Sant Miquel (Sant Joan de Labritja Ibiza) have joined the smoke-free campaign to prevent smoking, which now has 50 ‘Smoke-free beaches, healthy beaches’ in the Balearics .
It is incredibly tight towards the top and bottom of LaLiga and Dan Childs is previewing all 10 games in the Spanish top flight in week 28.

arts.ttl: LaLiga injury news, predicted lineups, fantasy updates
arts.sum: Find out who is missing through injury and who is in a race against time to prove their fitness in Spain's LaLiga this weekend.
